H0.text: Diffusion is the cell process directly responsible for Steve's growth, which caused him to be shorter than his brother last year and taller than his brother this year.

H1.text: Mitosis is the cell process directly responsible for Steve's growth, which made him taller this year compared to his brother, after being shorter last year.

H2.text: Osmosis is the cell process directly responsible for Steve's growth, which allowed him to go from being shorter than his brother last year to taller this year.

H3.text: Respiration is the cell process directly responsible for Steve's growth, allowing him to be taller this year than his brother after having been shorter last year.

A4.text: Development and growth: The number of cells within an organism increases by mitosis. This is the basis of the development of a multicellular body from a single cell, i.e., zygote and also the basis of the growth of a multicellular body.
